title: Stay away..I’ve never written a review but...
text:
This is the worst casino app I have ever played. I feel completely ripped off. Cannot breath without it cutting me off, must have signed back in 50 times in half hour, funnily enough when I may have actually won something. 
Play £2 a spin and the most you get is 20p win if your lucky. How’s that even close to being fair? £38 played for a terrible experience. What’s more I tried to withdraw my £10 I originally paid but it just kept saying the money in the account was bonus and couldn’t withdraw. So even if I got up to £100 I wouldnt be able to withdraw anyway. (I tried when I won some small amounts and when I was low on funds it made no difference) my point is I feel I have been ripped off I will tell anyone and everyone to stay clear. I think this needs to be reported as the app is fraudulent and taking money off people. I understand gambling rules, you win some and you loose. I know I’m wasting my breath as I will not get my money back but PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD! Save yourself from wasting your time and money. Disgusting 🤬🤬🤬🤬I just wish I would have read the reviews first. How do they get away with this?

title: Don’t download!!
text: Had to sign in every time I opened and closed the app. Their machines paid out £600 out to me off their free £10 bet when I tried to withdraw n they seen that they took £500 off me and left me with £100 saying the maximum you can win off the £10 free bet they need to be more specific when signing up and even at that couldn’t withdraw the £100. Played with it and the machines took everything and left me with nothing. Win some loose some but this was just scandless, paid out well until I tried to withdraw and they took it back. Felt completely robbed.

title: Utter garbage
text:
32 red should be investigated as it is so bad, the app and website continuously loses connection to survey and kicks you out of the game. At first I thought it maybe the app that was faulty but after trying online and it doing exactly the same thing realised that it is to much of a coincidence for this to be happening to both. Once it kicks you out you then have to go back into the game and start from scratch! 

Gambling sites bang on so much about money laundering and treat customers fairly but this company is so clearly a con company and lives up to it’s awful reviews. Listen to the reviews and steer well clear from this company!!

title: DISGUSTING DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!
text: Me and my partner had a £10 homies for jointing no deposit ‘ wicked .  I lose mrs wins £460 then tells her she has to wager £500 through the account and then what ever we won off off that we could keep so we was told by a call operator at 32 red . We then won £1200 and we were over the moon it transfered to cash and we was exited ‘ we then get told we are only getting £100 and the rest was going back to the casino after we have a recorded phone call of them telling us the opposite!! title: Rubbish peace of crap
text: My partner downloaded this and got her £10 bonus and won about 300 in cash and £10 in bonus cash and she went on to withdraw £240 in cash and was robbed by them as they only paid out £100 cash and took the rest and said £100 pound was all she was allowed even though she won £300 so you don’t get all of what you win and they clear your account with them off all the remaining money totally disgusting I would advise everyone never get this app it’s totally crap

title: Disgusted
text: I signed up for this Friday and followed all the rules. I had the £10 bonus and also deposited money too. I won almost £400 and went to withdraw it. Today I receive an email saying I'm not getting anything at all as they've confiscated my winnings. I've spoken to them numerous times today and their representatives were rude, didn't care at all. They didn't give any reason why I couldn't have my winnings just that they weren't going to give it to me

title: Greedy clawback of winnings
text:
I have played the downloaded version on desk top but in view of its greedy , immediate and blatantly obvious clawing back of any winnings, I would not advise risking this badly designed site. Extremely difficult to navigate, rare wins and generally substandard quality of whole thing.
 I take part in a large private online gambling forum and this site is by far and away the one that receives the worst reviews and the most criticism. My advice would be to avoid!

title: Waste Of Time!!
text: Do not bother with the £10 bonus as you get NONE of it in your winnings if you win big, I won £500 in who wants to be a millionare and it all went into my bonus!!! You cannot get any real money from the £10 bonus UNLESS you put your OWN money in, and even then, the site takes 75% from your bonus and 25% from your own cash, meaning you BARELY get anything for your own cash! Absolute waste of time!!!!!!

title: DONT EVEN BOTHER DOWNLOADING
text: 32 Red is quite possibly the worst betting app I have ever used, It's a disgrace! It kept crashing and kicking me out of the numerous times and when I spoke to them in the chat a girl named Cheyenne was rude and careless towards me. Cheyenne was so rude that because I wasn't happy she wanted to deactivate my account. Please give bad reviews people to stop this idiotic site wheeling people in. I didn't even want to love a star but it's the only choice I could give for a bad review.

title: Shameful Tacky Waste of Time
text: Clunky unresponsive app with a maze of menus that don’t provide any feedback when clicking and leave you waiting and wondering. Plenty of bugs, buttons don’t work, can’t claim £10 free bonus, dodgy Terms. For an app and company that deals with money it just feels like the whole app has been done on a shoestring budget which doesn’t reflect well. Would I trust them with my money? Absolutely not.

title: Love it
text: Deposited £10 and won straight away £50 and was able to withdraw easily. Only down side was the time it takes to process a withdrawal other than that I love 32 red:)

title: Avoid the scam
text: I put 10£ and got another 10£ bonus, i have gone up to 400£ but i found out 100£ was cash 300£ bonus, how they calculated that i am not sure, i decided to withdraw 100£ through paypal, 300£ bonus disappeared, 100£ never came to my paypal, after a few days it was back into casino accounts, never let me withdraw it. Don’t waste your money on this app.

Games crash partway through and then you are unable to reload them unless you close the app attempt to log back in and try again. But no promises I’m afraid. title: I haven't won, 70 pounds gone
text: The app itself is nice and easy. Since the start, the money I've won have not exceeded 10 pounds. I have been playing dream catcher, blackjacks and roulettes, they are easy to play but never let you win much money. If you want to try the app, I guess you can. But one advice, if you lose that starting money - do not ever deposit, ever again!

title: Rubbish app
text: Haven’t even had the app an hour and it has lost server connection 3 times and now won’t let me log in with my password. If you use password recovery and leave the app to read the email they send you it exits the screen you are on and leaves you in a loop! I hope the desktop version is actually fit for purpose.

title: Massive scam!
text: I downloaded the 32Red app and deposited £20 to get a bonus (£32 for each £10 deposited). I then opened the slots and after about 5 rolls it would crash saying “Unable to connect to servers”, I lost several small wins and opened the bonus round and again lost connection... quite simply a huge scam rip off! DO NOT waste your time or money on the 2nd grade scam...
